name: slithery
content:
slithery adjective
(WET/SMOOTH)
Add to word list
Add to word list
If something is slithery, it is wet or smooth so that it moves easily and quickly across a surface while twisting or curving, or causes something to slide in this way: We now had to get back down the slithery path in the cold and dark. She felt something slithery against her legs.
More examplesFewer examplesSnakes are sleek and slithery, and many people are absolutely terrified of them.
